select a.id,a.name,a.number,a.type,if(a.type=1,'内部讲师','外部讲师') as typeName,a.organization_name,a.level, b.name as levelName,a.status,if(a.status=1,'有效','无效') as statusName from train_base_teacher a left join train_constant b on a.level = b.id
a.is_delete = 0
and a.name like '%${name}%'
and a.type = #{type}
and a.level = #{level}
and a.organization_name like '%${organizationName}%'
order by a.id desc
select avatar from train_base_teacher where is_delete = 0 and id = #{id}

select id,name,number,type, IF(type = 1, "内部讲师", "外部讲师") AS typeName, organization_name from train_base_teacher
status = 1
and name like '%${name}%'
order by id asc

select a.id,a.name,a.number,if(a.type=1,'内部讲师','外部讲师') as typeName,a.organization_name, CONCAT(a.level, "-", b.name) as levelName, IF(a.status = 1, "1-有效", "0-无效") AS statusName from train_base_teacher a left join train_constant b on a.level = b.id
a.is_delete = 0
and a.name like '%${name}%'
and a.type = #{type}
and a.level = #{level}
and a.organization_name like '%${organizationName}%'
order by a.id desc
